name: PROTECT THE BEACH
description:
Hello,
Tired of letting these crabs take control of YOUR beach? It's time to pay back!
Join DuckDuck and eliminate them all! Every 10 waves comes a new boss with an insatiable thirst for blood, can you stop them all?
Improve your powers with each wave and become stronger to prevent attacks, but be careful, as you won't be the only one to get stronger!
